message:
Dear {{ expense_approver_name or employee_name }},

The Expense Claim submitted by {{ employee_name }} has been approved and is now finalised.

You can view the finalised claim by clicking the link below:
View Finalised Expense Claim

This notification is for your information. No further action is required.

Regards,
Finance Team
name: Expense Claim Submitted Notification
subject: Expense Claim of {{ employee_name }} Has Been Approved and Finalised
